评论概述: Affordable boys suit for the holidays
评论详情: Loved the colors in the suit.  Classic and timeless.  Fit was true to size.  Roomy enough to fit a husky sized boy.  I like that it came with a bow tie as well as a traditional tie.  Shirt is wash and wear right out of the washer and dryer.  It did wrinkle up even placed in the closet (but I’ve probably got too much in there which doesn’t help).  But I washed and they came right out.  Good price point.  Shipped quickly.  Soft lightweight fabric.  Came with a couple of extra buttons in case you lost one.

Size 8 fit my soon to be 8 year old son.  He is on the thinner side so I would suggest sizing up if your child is 8. Well worth the money, quality feels better than what you pay for it.
My grandson loved his Christmas outfit. He calls it his "handsome" clothes.

The suit itself is a very nice looking suit! But unfortunately, it does not have an adjustable vest as pictured so it is gigantic on my son. The pants are also not adjustable. If your son is lean, not skinny, but not filled out, this will not fit. Additionally, it isn't made as well as previous vest suit sets I have received in the past. There are many loose thread ends that will need to be cut off prior to wearing.  Good luck!

It's not going to look like a luxury brand suit, but for the price- it gets the job done. The tie and pocket square are flimsy and look a bit cheap so we used our own. Runs true to size in our experience, we have ordered this brand twice.
Sleeves short and plant legs are shorter than expected.  Arrived quickly and a good value for the money of they had fit.  My son really liked the bright color and design.
Quality is great for the price, but size runs small.  Order one size bigger if you want it to fit.
Just as described, my kid loves it
Ok you can't beat the price and the look. It's true to size and it was absolutely perfect for a wedding. My son loved how it looked that he wants it in another color as well.

If you need an inexpensive suit this is the way to go. I have order probably 8 at this point. Possible more. every year I order two suits for my two boys. They are true to size. The pants don't have a button but they look nice and have some elastic in the back of the waist. The shirts are nice and not super thin. I love that you get a tie and bowtie so the boys can pick. It really is a great piece to have on hand. My kids use them for holidays. I have tried other brands but this is my favorite. I will say that some brands have a nicer quality fabric for the pants and vest but them the tie and shirt are garbage. With this set you are getting decent across the board.
Value for money. Irons well! I need 3 more suits in 5T from them.
